alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Citrus and northwestern Hernando Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homosassa Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homosassa Springs, Pine Island, Homosassa, North Weeki Wachee, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Sugarmill Woods, Chassahowitzka Refuge, Royal Highlands, Chassahowitzka, Green Acres, Lake Lindsey, Leisure Acres, Glen Lakes and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando
